tables.phrase:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_phrase` (
  `phrase_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `phrase_group` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `phrase_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `default_value` varchar(255) DEFAULT '',
  `is_edited` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`phrase_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `phrase_group` (`phrase_group`,`phrase_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.phrase_language:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_phrase_language` (
  `id` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.phrase_value:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_phrase_value` (
  `phrase_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `language_id` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `phrase_value` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`phrase_id`,`language_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
